DOC.brief_summary: This study will investigate the efficacy and safety of lumiracoxib in patients with primary knee osteoarthritis (OA).
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Lumiracoxib in Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis (OA).
DOC.criteria: Primary osteoarthritis of knee (confirmed by American College of Rheumatology [ACR] criteria). Requirement of regular nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug (NSAID) therapy. Evidence of active gastrointestinal ulceration within 12 months prior to the screening visit or history of active gastrointestinal bleeding within the previous 5 years. Known hypersensitivity to analgesics, antipyretics, or NSAIDS (including celecoxib). Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
